name: Bel
resist: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Fear Aura
text: Any creature hostile to Bel that starts its turn within 20 feet of him must make a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw, unless Bel is incapacitated. Unless the save succeeds, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to Bel's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
text: If Bel fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: Bel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: Bel's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23). Bel can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
3/day each: dispel magic, hold monster, mirror image, mislead, raise dead, teleport, wall of fire

action.name: Multiattack
text: Bel makes three attacks: two with his greatsword and one with his tail.

action.name: Greatsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 23 (4d6 + 9) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that is not being held or worn, it catches fire.

action.name: Tail
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 25 (3d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

The fiend (devil) can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The fiend (devil) regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Tactical Edge (Costs 2 Actions)
text: Roll a d6 for Bel. The number rolled on the die is subtracted from the next attack roll made against Bel or an ally of his choice within the next minute.

legendary.name: Summon Ice Devil (Costs 3 Actions)
text: Bel magically summons an ice devil with an ice spear (as described in the ice devil's entry in the Monster Manual). The ice devil appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Bel, acts as Bel's ally, and can summon other devils if it has such power. The ice devil remains until Bel dies or until he dismisses it as an action.

spells: detect magic, fireball, dispel magic, hold monster, mirror image, mislead, raise dead, teleport, wall of fire, imprisonment, meteor swarm
description:
From his bastion, Zariel's second-in-command and the former lord of Avernus oversees the forges that furnish weapons and armor for the Blood War. Though Asmodeus has instructed Zariel to accept Bel as her advisor, Bel and Zariel loathe each other and invent distractions to keep them apart.
Bel outwardly plays the role of Zariel's loyal vassal. However, Bel rankles at Zariel's rulership of the layer of the Nine Hells that was once his, but he won't challenge her directly as long as he thinks Asmodeus supports Zariel.
Source: Baldur's Gate: Descent Into Avernus p. 115
